nodes.text: The Royal Bedchamber was the bedchamber of the Queen Mother of the Hapes Consortium and was located in the Fountain Palace on Hapes connected to the Queen's Drawing Room. The room was dominated by a huge bed covered by a crown-shaped canopy, which was surrounded by other furniture, including many couches, armchairs, and writing desks. It had two other rooms that in 36 ABY included a simple sleeping pallet that Tenel Ka preferred to sleep on and in the farthest room, a crib for her baby Allana. It was here that Jacen Solo came to meet the Queen in 36 ABY, when he discovered he was Allana's father.
